video_prompt: Voluminous, wind-blown dark hair subtly sways around a synthetic woman's face, with tiny gold flecks shimmering and drifting. Delicate mechanical seams on her face faintly pulse. Her mechanical neck and shoulders display intricate blue circuitry that pulses and flows. Iridescent jewels on her high-collared garment and dangling earrings continuously shift their spectrum of colors and sparkle with every subtle movement. Dynamic glitch art effects flicker and ripple across her body, with horizontal color bands shifting and digital distortion pulsing. Faint blue and purple lights subtly undulate and drift in the dark background, emphasizing a shifting digital realm.
image_prompt: Highly detailed stylized portrait of a delicate young synthetic woman, head and upper torso, vertical orientation. Pale porcelain-like skin with subtle rosy undertones, large captivating light grey-blue-green eyes with long dark winged eyeliner and sparkling gems at outer corners, soft mauve lips, and faint mechanical seams on face. Voluminous dark hair with gold flecks and subtle blue/green hues, styled dynamically. Intricate mechanical neck and shoulders with glowing blue circuitry. Wears a high-collared, lustrous white/silver futuristic qipao with etched patterns and large iridescent blue/purple/pink jewels. Elaborate sparkling blue/gold dangling earrings. Prominent glitch art effects throughout: horizontal bands of vibrant shifting colors (red, green, blue, purple, white), vertical pixelation, and chromatic aberration. Dramatic lighting with strong reflections and internal cybernetic glow. Dark, indistinct background with subtle blue/purple light. Futuristic, ethereal aesthetic, blending organic beauty with advanced cybernetic technology.
refined_video_prompt: Hair subtly sways, wind-blown, with tiny gold flecks shimmering and drifting. Delicate mechanical facial seams faintly pulse. Blue circuitry on her neck and shoulders pulses and flows. Iridescent jewels on her garment and earrings continuously shift their color spectrum and sparkle with subtle movements. Dynamic glitch art effects flicker and ripple across her body, with horizontal color bands shifting and digital distortion pulsing. Faint blue and purple background lights subtly undulate and drift, emphasizing a shifting digital realm.
